articles.author: Ewan Murray
articles.title: LIV rebel Koepka co-leads the Masters with Rahm and Hovland after day one - The Guardian
articles.description: Brooks Koepka, Jon Rahm and Viktor Hovland co-lead the Masters after all shooting seven under on the first day at Augusta
articles.content:
Greg Norman may have the last laugh. Given the trauma Augusta National caused the Australian during his playing days, it would surely be an almighty roar.
Normans position front and centre of LIVs d… [+5647 chars]
